alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 8:52PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL CITRUS... NORTHWESTERN PASCO AND HERNANDO COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM EST... At 851 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Pine Island to 9 miles northwest of Hudson to 12 miles northwest of Beacon Square. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Brooksville, Hudson, Weeki Wachee, South Brooksville, North Brooksville, Jasmine Estates, Weeki Wachee Gardens, Pine Island, Hernando County Airport, North Weeki Wachee, Timber Pines, New Port Richey East, Sugarmill Woods, Royal Highlands, High Point, Lake Lindsey, Shady Hills, Glen Lakes, and Bayonet Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
